topic_metadata.title: How to change the language of a document?

posts.cooked: Basically the title; searching the docs for “language” or “document language” did not yield anything useful. How can I specify the language of my document, so that e.g. hyphenation is done correctly?
posts.raw: Basically the title; searching the docs for "language" or "document language" did not yield anything useful. How can I specify the language of my document, so that e.g. hyphenation is done correctly?

posts.cooked:
The text function has a parameter lang, with which you can set it for either parts of the document or the whole document.

For example:

#set text(
  lang: "de"
)

Here a link to the documentation: Text Function – Typst Documentation
posts.raw:
The text function has a parameter lang, with which you can set it for either parts of the document or the whole document. 

For example:
```typst
#set text(
  lang: "de"
)
```

Here a link to the documentation: https://typst.app/docs/reference/text/text/#parameters-lang
